channel.title: NPC Drops? -- PROJECT 16 V6
channel.description:
Hi, I'm currently making a mini-game/maze type thing for my server, and I'm half-way done it, and need to get the NPC's to drop the keys needed. NPCDrops.cfg won't work, and I can't get it to work. If that is what it is, could it be the DropType? Because I have no clue what the DropType is =/. Or do you create the drops somewhere else? Help plx.
Thanks!

item.title: NPC Drops? -- PROJECT 16 V6
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

They are. That’s how I got the ID’s, searching for the descriptions, because I was looking for keys I should use, and thought of Melzar’s, and searched for those, and found the 6 of the colored keys used in Melzar’s Maze in there.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops? -- PROJECT 16 V6
item.dc:creator: @Zaroyn Zaroyn
item.description:
@Zaroyn wrote:

make sure that all of the keys are in your item.cfg.

Read full topic
